Blog.post: for my success picture i chose a picture of a graduation gown. i chose this because you achieved something you probably thought you couldnt. it also shows you worked hard to get where you are now. this picture symbolizes success,hard working and giving it 100%.
#1) can COLLEGE really excell my trough life? #2) can i go to the COLLEGE of my choice? #3) can COLLEGE be concidered a waste of my time?

MANY QUESTIONS SURFACED UP,SUCH AS WHAT COLLEGE WILL I ATTEND,HOW WILL I PAY, AND WHAT WILL I DO IN THE FUTURE? SOME OF THESE ANSWERS ARE EASILLY ANSWERED, BUT SOME ARE A LITTLE MORE COMPLICATED. I WANT TO BE AN ARCHITECT, BUT I DONT KNOW WHAT SCOOL CAN OFFER ME ARCHITECTURAL CLASSES OR A GREAT ART CLASS OR EVEN A COMPUTER GRAPHICS CLASS.IM HOPING I CAN GET A SCHOLARSHIP FOR ANYTHING (I DONT WANT TO ASK MY PARENTS FOR MONEY AND I DONT WANT TO GET A PART TIME JOB AND JUGGLE COLLEGE AND A SCHOOL EVERY DAY). WILL I MAKE IT IN THIS WORLD OR WILL I CRUMBLE UNDERNEATH ALL THIS STRESS AND PRESURE?ANOTHER UNANSWERABLE QUESTION. I THINK IT DEPENDS ON IF YOU DO IT TO THE FULL EXTENT AND ALWAYS GIVE IT 100% ,OTHER WISE YOU WILL FAIL HORRIBLY IN LIFE. ITS A SAD TRUTH.AS A CURIOUS STUDENT,I CRAVE FOR KNOLEDGE AND ANSWERS. THIS INCLUDES ANSWERS TO THESE QUESTIONS.BLAST HELPS ME BECAUSE IT PREPARES ME FOR COLLEGE BY TEACHING ME VALUABLE SKILLS.

FEAR IS THE FEELING OF HATE AND SADNESS WRAPPED INTO ONE YOUR ALWAYS MISURRABLE , YOU NEVER HAVE FUN FEAR CONSUMES YOUR BODY MIND AND SOUL AND LEAVES IT THERE WOUNDED AND LOST IN A HOLE FEAR TAKES OVER CHILDREN AND ADULTS ALIKE FEAR IS AN ENEMY THAT DOESNT QUIT A FIGHT FEAR LEADS TO ANGER,ANGER TO HATE HATE IS MY LIFE AND ALSO MY FATE

the last time you saw me i was a wreck, the last time you saw me i was a mess, the last time you saw me i was in pain, the last time you saw me you didnt help, the last time you saw me you laughed, the last time you saw me you hurt me, the last you saw me was my last day on earth, now the next time you see me ill be in a coffin burried underground, and that will be the last day youll see me.
